name: Mystic Meadow
description:
Mystic Meadow is a short adventure game about a mystical fox. You catch bugs during the day and at night, while you search for a way to summon the spirit of the meadow. 

I made this game to teach myself game development, so it's really just practice. I probably won't be able to fix every bug that pops up, but if you find anything major  leave a comment below and I'll look into it.

This game will always be totally free on Itch.io. 

Thanks!
